roleset.name: mark with ink
roleset.note: INK-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls butter-9.9, scribble-25.2. Comparison to 'mark'. (from ink.01-v)

role.descr: theme, the ink itself or what is being depicted in ink
destination, what the ink is being applied to

example.name: All args
example.text: Oudin was inking her signature to a new endorsement deal right before the match.

example.name: Contractual agreement as destination
example.text: The Drums inked their Island Records deal at MTV HQ before the gig.

example.name: Possessor raising: contractee as destination
example.text: They must think highly of his arm because they inked him with an $889,200 signing bonus.

example.name: tattoo frame
example.text: She shivered-was that [a swastika]-1 inked *trace*-1 onto his forehead?

example.name: fingerprinting frame, passive
example.text: After [the finger]-1 is inked *trace*-1, the square is rolled around the finger without letting it slip.

example.name: +instrument
example.text: [This cover]-1 was inked *trace*-1 with a Japanese brush pen, one of those disposable types.
example.arg: with a Japanese brush pen, one of those disposable types.

example.name: oblique theme, pronominal core destination
example.text: I also inked him with grey wash tones on Howard the Duck and Dracula.
example.arg: with grey wash tones on Howard the Duck and Dracula

roleset.name: fill with ink
roleset.note: INK-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. Member of Vncls butter-9.9. Comparison to 'fill'. (from ink.02-v)

role.descr: agent, entity filling the reservoir with ink
destination, thing being filled with ink

example.name: All arguments
example.text: I inked the pen with my favourite Ottoman Azure.

example.name: with charm!
example.text: He inked his pen with subtle charm then sent me to the funny farm.

roleset.name: squirt ink (like an octopus or squid)
roleset.note: INK-V NOTES: Roleset by Julia based on internet search and wordnet. No Vncls. Comparison to 'spray'. (from ink.03-v)

roles.note: Arg1, the ink itself, is rarely if ever seen. (from ink.03-v)

role.descr: where the ink is being squirted

example.name: Octopus intransitive
example.text: Whenever the man would start to come out the octopus inked some more.
example.arg: Whenever the man would start to come out

example.name: squid intransitive
example.text: On one occasion the squid inked in unison and then jetted off at considerable speed.

example.name: transitive with animate patient/destination
example.text: The octopus inked the boy repeatedly.

example.name: transitive with inanimate destination
example.text: Right when he was going to add some other fish the octopus inked the whole tank.
example.arg: Right when he was going to add some other fish
